sentences.english: "Lucrece, " quoth he, "this night I must enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 佳丽，今夜，你须归我享用。

sentences.english: You can drop the moonlight and magnolias , Scarlett.
sentences.chinese: 你可以撕下你的假面具了，斯佳丽。

sentences.english: Or if Scarlett climbs, then I can climb it.
sentences.chinese: 或者，如果斯佳丽的攀升，那么我可以爬上去。

sentences.english: Scarlett, we owe him a well-born child.
sentences.chinese: 斯佳丽，我们该好好地为他接生孩子。

sentences.english: Made from the traditional, regional grape varieties Grenache and Carignan.
sentences.chinese: 采用本地区传统的特色品种歌海娜和佳丽酿精酿而成。

sentences.english: And every time, Callie barks at it.
sentences.chinese: 而每次佳丽都会对着门吠叫。

sentences.english: Beauties from 106 countries and regions took part in this year's 3x4 Nomadic Pop Up Display With Photo Panel .
sentences.chinese: 来自106个国家和地区的佳丽参加了今年的比赛。

sentences.english: Scarlett, change your dress and go over to Miss Melly's for the evening.
sentences.chinese: 斯佳丽，换件衣服，你今晚去梅勒妮家去。

sentences.english: Scarlett is a woman who will never go to Canossa in fighting against her destiny.
sentences.chinese: 斯佳丽是一个在与命运作斗争时永不屈服的女子。

sentences.english: Beauties from 106 countries and regions took part in this year's contest.
sentences.chinese: 来自106个国家和地区的佳丽参加了今年的比赛。

sentences.english: Callie and Thunder both have roughly the same degree of defense drive.
sentences.chinese: 佳丽和雷电大致拥有同样程度的防御性驱力。

sentences.english: Both Callie and Thunder are weak nerved dogs.
sentences.chinese: 佳丽与雷电都是弱神经型的犬。

sentences.english: And every time, Callie barks at it. If someone.
sentences.chinese: 而每次佳丽都会对着门吠叫。

sentences.english: These English beauties are available to everyone.
sentences.chinese: 这些英国佳丽谁都可以染指。

definition: national grace, divine fragrance (idiom); an outstanding beauty
face powder and eyebrow liner/cosmetics/(fig.) beautiful woman
vying to be the most glamorous/each more gorgeous than the other/beauty contest
the queen of flowers (refers esp. to plum blossom)/(fig.) nickname for a famous beauty or courtesan
